name: abclib
description: abclib library is released by the CICM / MUSIDANSE (Centre de Recherches Informatique et Cr√©ation Musicale, Paris 8 University) and is the result of 20 years of research, teaching and creation in mixed music, expressed as a set of codes in Faust language. The main topics addressed are: spatial sound processing and synthesis using ambisonics multi-channel sound processing utility objects for mixed music
author: Alain Bonardi, Paul Goutmann, David Fierro, Adrien Zanni
